channel.title: coffee on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in coffee on Inductive Bias

item.title: Service as in real good customer service
item.description: Service as in real good customer service # First thing to do after getting up: Go to the kitchen and switch on the coffee machine. However, one random Sunday morning that caused the fuse for exactly this kitchen to go off. After fixing that we turned on the coffee machine again - trying to finally get a first cup. All worked well until having a closer look at what the machine produced as coffee: It was cold!
